Welcome to the Okta Application!

Now that the Okta Application is installed, you need to configure it to link it to your Okta account.

Configuring your Account using QR code

Scanning the QR code with your phone’s camera is the easiest way to configure your account.

1. On your phone, open the Okta app and tap the Scan Code button.

2. Scan the QR code on your computer screen using your phone’s camera.

A secret is saved message will display and you’ll see the passcode generator screen, which will generate passcodes for you to use when prompted for extra verification. You’ll have 30 seconds to enter the passcode before a new one is generated.

That’s it! You can now complete the extra verification steps.

Configuring your Account Manually

You can also configure your account manually.

1. On your phone, open the Okta app and tap the enter manually button.

2. In the Okta Account field, enter your okta username (i.e ted@mycompany.com)

3. Enter the key displayed on your computer in the Secret Key field.

4. Click Save.

You’ll see the passcode generator screen, which will generate passcodes for you to use when prompted for extra verification. You’ll have 30 seconds to enter in the passcode before a new one is generated.

That’s it! You can now complete the extra verification steps.

Reconfigure your Account

You can revoke your existing Okta App passcode and reconfigure your account at anytime.

1. Sign in to your organization’s Okta address. (i.e. mycompany.okta.com)

2. Click on the Account Tab

3. In the Extra Verification section, click the Edit button and click Yes in the Set up Okta App Dialog box.

4. Follow the prompts and reconfigure your account.

"Welcome to the Okta Verify App! Your company is using extra verification to provide an added level of security and the Okta App will provide the verification codes used for signing into the Okta service.
How do you want to configure your Okta account?"
Scanning a code requires Barcode Scanner. Would you like to install it?
Failed to extract user name and/or secret key from URI.
How do you want to configure your Okta account?
